div.span: Fever and chills - The fever and chills have been occurring for 2 days. There has been associated cough (green sputum).

1 (one) Tablet two times daily for 7 days
2 (two) Puff every six hours, as needed for wheezing for 30 days
Patient may continue to experience low grade fever and chills
